Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

Every time I'm near the Pyramids (~50km) KSP crashes and return to desktop with this error:

========== OUTPUTING STACK TRACE ==================

ERROR: Error while initializing dbghelp.dll, GetLastError: 'Operazione completata.' (Address: 00000000)

========== END OF STACKTRACE ===========

Can we help me?

This is the error log:

Error: http://pastebin.com/7j8Ednpe
